LogMessage.Message: Congrats on level 80 on BTN/MIN and all Crafters.

CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Congrats on level 80 on BTN/MIN and all Crafters.\n:)", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(40000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Going to learn Chocobo Flying!", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(20000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Going to learn Doh/DoL classes, this profile will stop when completed!", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(20000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "You have not completed the quest Litany of Peace HW Patch 3.3.\n Please run through Heavensward MSQ to complete the quest!", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Please set the meld setting atop of Start profile to 0\n and meld any items you crafted and restart the profile.\n Info on required materia atop of Start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(40000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Craft level 21 craft and gather gear, import order into lisbeth.\n You can find it under Gear Sets folder, remove any items you don't want to craft and\n set craft21 setting to 0 on start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Craft level 40 gathering gear, import order into lisbeth.\n You can find it under Gear Sets folder, remove any items you don't want to craft and\n set craft40 setting to 0 on start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Craft level 63 gear, import order into lisbeth.\n You can find it under Gear Sets folder, remove any items you don't want to craft and\n set craft63 setting to 0 on start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Get Master III books and then Craft class quest items, import orders into lisbeth.\n You can find it under Quest Items folder, clear bags before beginning and store items in\n a safe place for later and set craftClass setting to 0 on start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Clean inventory, set craftClass1 to 0 then restart start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Get level 70 gear, import order into lisbeth.\n You can find it under Gear Sets folder, remove any items you don't want to get and\n set craft70 setting to 0 on start profile.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(25000);

Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "Make sure you have Diadem flying enabled in Lisbeth.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(5000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(5000);
